https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/addit._instruction: Enter additional remarks about the parcellation entity version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/addit.description: Mention of what deserves additional attention or notice.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/addit.title: additionalRemarks

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/alter._instruction: If applicable, enter one or several alternative names, inlcuding abbreviations, for this parcellation entity version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/alter.title: alternativeName

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/corre._instruction: If necessary, enter a refined/correct name for this parcellation entity version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/corre.title: correctedName

anchorPoint.description: Structured information on a coordinate point.

coordinateSpace._instruction: Add the coordinate space in which this coordinate point exists in.
coordinateSpace.description: Two or three dimensional geometric setting.
coordinateSpace.title: coordinateSpace

coordinates.description: Structured information on a quantitative value.

typeOfUncertainty._instruction: Add the type of uncertainty used to determine the uncertainity for this quantitative value.
typeOfUncertainty.description: Distinct technique used to quantify the uncertainty of a measurement.
typeOfUncertainty.title: typeOfUncertainty

uncertainty._instruction: Enter the uncertainty of this quantitative value.
uncertainty.description: Quantitative value range defining the uncertainty of a measurement.
uncertainty.title: uncertainty

unit._instruction: Add the unit of measurement of this quantitative value and its uncertainty.
unit.description: Determinate quantity adopted as a standard of measurement.
unit.title: unit

value._instruction: Enter the value of this quantitative value.
value.title: value

coordinateSpace._instruction: Add the common coordinate space version for this annotation.
coordinateSpace.description: Two or three dimensional geometric setting.
coordinateSpace.title: coordinateSpace

criteria._instruction: Add the protocol execution defining the criteria that were applied to produce this annotation.
criteria.description: Aspects or standards on which a judgement or decision is based.
criteria.title: criteria

criteriaQualityType._instruction: Add the quality type of the stated criteria used to define this annotation.
criteriaQualityType.description: Distinct class that defines how the judgement or decision was made for a particular criteria.
criteriaQualityType.title: criteriaQualityType

criteriaType._instruction: Add the criteria type for this annotation.
criteriaType.title: criteriaType

inspiredBy._instruction: Add one or several (source) files that inspired the definition of this annotation.
inspiredBy.title: inspiredBy

internalIdentifier._instruction: Enter the identifier used for this annotation within the file it is stored in.
internalIdentifier.description: Term or code that identifies someone or something within a particular product.
internalIdentifier.title: internalIdentifier

laterality._instruction: Add one or both sides of the body, bilateral organ or bilateral organ part that this annotation is defined in.
laterality.description: Differentiation between a pair of lateral homologous parts of the body.
laterality.title: laterality

additionalRemarks._instruction: Enter any additional remarks that are needed to interpret the properties of the viewer specification.
additionalRemarks.description: Mention of what deserves additional attention or notice.
additionalRemarks.title: additionalRemarks

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hasPa._instruction: Add the defined anatomical parent structure (version) for this parcellation entity version, or several if required.

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name.title: name
